title: Organizational Learning Innovation Using E-Books and Mobile Commerce

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device usage skills and understanding of organizational learning concepts
context.additional_context: Aimed at in-service professionals to learn mobile-based e-book information sharing and mobile commerce trends, with the goal of improving knowledge management efficiency within organizations.

learning_goals: Learners can design and implement knowledge-sharing processes within organizations using e-book platforms.
Learners can analyze mobile commerce trends and propose strategies for applying them to organizational learning.
Learners can verify the feasibility and effectiveness of e-book-based learning solutions through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
